thread.title: Missouri governor defies calls for resignation over felony indictment

title: Missouri governor defies calls for resignation over felony indictment
text:
Missouri governor defies calls for resignation over felony indictment 7:08pm GMT - 01:20 
Missouri Governor Eric Greitens is defying calls for his resignation after he was indicted on a felony invasion of privacy charge in connection with an extramarital affair. Linda So reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Missouri Governor Eric Greitens is defying calls for his resignation after he was indicted on a felony invasion of privacy charge in connection with an extramarital affair. Linda So reports.
